import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Nav, NavItem, Row ,Container, Col, NavLink } from 'reactstrap'; const Signup = (props) => { const [dropdownOpen, setDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const [step , setStep]= useState(1); const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [phone , setPhone]= useState(''); const [email, setEmail]= useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [password2, setPassword2] = useState(''); const [registerType, setRegisterType] = useState(''); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [err, setErr] = useState([]) const toggle = () => setDropdownOpen(!dropdownOpen); const onSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); } return (
setStep(1)} className={step===1? 'active bg-primary':'inactive'} >Step 1 {name && email && password ?setStep(2):err.push("Please fill all the fields") console.log({name, password, email, password}) }} className={step===2? 'active bg-primary':'inactive'} >Step 2
{ step===1?
{ err ? err.map((error)=>{ return(
{error}
) }) :null }
onSubmit} className="form">
setName(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Enter full name" className="form-control" name="name"/>
setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter email" className="form-control" name="email"/>
setPassword(e.target.value)} type="password" placeholder="Enter password" className="form-control" name="password"/>
setPassword2(e.target.value)} type="password" placeholder="Confirm password" className="form-control" name="password2"/>
{ (!name?setErr(...err, "Please enter name"):null); (!password?setErr(...err, "Please enter password "):null); (!email?setErr(...err, "Please enter email"):null) ( password2===password? setErr(...err,"Password does not match"):null) } } value="Next" className="form-control signup btn btn-primary"/>
:null } { step===2?
Please enter all fields
setPhone(e.target.value)} type="telephone" placeholder="Enter your phone number" className="form-control" name="phone_number"/>
setRegisterType(e.target.value)} name="select" type="radio" value="leader"/>Register as a leader setRegisterType(e.target.value)} name="select" type="radio" value="market"/>Register for E-market
: null }
); } export default Signup;
